column1: The reaction mixture ( final volume 0. 5 ml) consisted of potassium phosphate buffer ( 100 mM K2HPO4, 0. 1 mM EDTA, 5 mM DTT, 30 mM nicotinamide, pH 7. 4), [ 14C] - cholesterol ( 5 x 105 dpm) solubilized in 50 mu l of 25% ( wt / vol) beta - cyclodextrin ( final concentration 0. 8%), and 50 - 200 mu g of microsomal protein.

Soleus fibers were separated and then transferred to a buffer ( 2. 77 mM K2Ca - EGTA, 7. 23 mM K2EGTA, 6. 56 mM MgCl2, 20 mM imidazole, 53. 3 mM K - MES, 20 mM taurine, 5. 3 mM ATP, 15 mM PCr, 3 mM KH2PO4, 0. 5 mM DTT [ pH 7. 1]) supplemented with 50 mu g / ml saponin and permeabilized for 30 min at 4 degrees C with gentle stirring.

L - CPT I, liver - type carnitine palmitoyltransferase; MCAD, medium - chain acyl - CoA dehydrogenase; SREBP, sterol regulatory element binding protein; SCD, steroyl - CoA desaturase; FAS, fatty acid synthase; GPAT, glycerol - 3 - phosphate acyltransferase; DGAT, diacylglycerol acyltransferase

Mouse R1 ES cells [ 49] were maintained on gelatin - coated plates with feeder layers of mouse embryonic fibroblasts at 37 degrees C under 5% CO2 in ES cell medium ( DMEM [ high glucose] supplemented with 15% fetal bovine serum, 0. 1 mM non - essential amino acids, 2 mM glutamine, 1 mM sodium pyruvate, 0. 1 mM 2 - mercaptoethanol, 100 U / ml penicillin, 100 mu g / ml streptomycin, 25 mu g / ml amphotericin, and 1, 000 U / ml of ESGro [ Chemicon]).

Hybridization was performed in a humidified chamber in a solution containing 50% formamide, 10% dextran sulfate, 1 x Denhardt ' s solution, 0. 6 M sodium chloride, 0. 01 M Tris buffer ( pH 7. 5), 0. 001 M EDTA, 0. 05 M dithiothreitol, 0. 25% SDS, 200 mu g tRNA, and 35S - labeled cRNA probe at the final concentration of 5 x 106 cpm / ml at 55 degrees C for 16 h.
